text: Executive summary: American Data Networks S.A. is a Costa Rican telecommunications provider focused on quality and continuous support. It serves homes and businesses with symmetric fiber Internet, managed networking and security, VoIP, and IPTV. All residential plans include Wi‑Fi equipment, a firewall, and 24/7 support. IPTV devices and residential VoIP can be added to any residential plan with clear monthly charges.
Differentiator: symmetric connectivity in residential plans (same upload and download speed).
Differentiator: Wi‑Fi equipment and firewall included in all residential plans.
Differentiator: 24/7 technical support for both residential and business customers.
Differentiator: optional IPTV with more than 100 channels.
Differentiator: optional residential VoIP telephony add‑on.
Differentiator: enterprise portfolio with managed fiber, networking, data center, security, and VoIP.
Residential portfolio: symmetric fiber Internet with Wi‑Fi and firewall included; optional IPTV (>100 channels) and residential VoIP; 24/7 technical support.
Business portfolio: fiber for mission‑critical operations; managed data center and networks with proactive monitoring; managed security and firewall; corporate VoIP; 24/7 technical support.

General rules for residential add‑ons: IPTV can be added as one or multiple devices (box/app compatible) at ₡4,590 I.V.I. per device per month. Residential VoIP can be added to any plan at ₡3,590 I.V.I. per month. Both add‑ons can be hired simultaneously.

Plan 100/100 Mbps — ₡20,500 I.V.I. Includes Wi‑Fi, firewall, and 24/7 support. Suggested for small households, HD streaming, single video calls, and basic remote work. Add‑ons: IPTV (₡4,590/device), VoIP (₡3,590).
Plan 250/250 Mbps — ₡26,600 I.V.I. For homes with several devices, online classes, and frequent video calls. Add‑ons: IPTV (₡4,590/device), VoIP (₡3,590).
Plan 500/500 Mbps (most popular) — ₡33,410 I.V.I. For 4K streaming, online gaming, multiple video calls, and cloud backups. Add‑ons: IPTV (₡4,590/device), VoIP (₡3,590).
Plan 1/1 Gbps — ₡49,500 I.V.I. For high simultaneous demand, content creators, and heavy backups. Add‑ons: IPTV (₡4,590/device), VoIP (₡3,590).
Monthly total example: 100/100 + 1 IPTV + VoIP → 20,500 + 4,590 + 3,590 = ₡28,680 I.V.I.
Monthly total example: 250/250 + 2 IPTV → 26,600 + (2 × 4,590) = ₡35,780 I.V.I.
Monthly total example: 500/500 + 1 IPTV → 33,410 + 4,590 = ₡38,000 I.V.I.
Monthly total example: 1 Gbps + 3 IPTV + VoIP → 49,500 + (3 × 4,590) + 3,590 = ₡66,860 I.V.I.

Residential IPTV add‑on: available for any residential plan; more than 100 channels (lineup may change due to programming agreements); monthly cost per device: ₡4,590 I.V.I.; multiple devices per home supported.
Residential VoIP add‑on: compatible with any residential plan; monthly cost: ₡3,590 I.V.I.; benefits include Internet‑based calling and potential savings over traditional telephony.

Coverage: ADN serves homes and businesses in Costa Rica. Coverage must be verified for the exact address before subscribing. Check at https://data.cr/cobertura — blue areas indicate guaranteed coverage.
Support and hours: technical support 24/7; administrative service Monday–Friday, 7:00 a.m.–5:00 p.m.
Contact: Phone +506 4050‑5050.
Contact: WhatsApp +506 7087‑8240.
Contact: General/commercial email info@data.cr.
Contact: Support email helpdesk@data.cr.
Payments and billing: ONVO payment link; cards accepted: Visa, Mastercard, American Express. SINPE IBAN and SINPE Móvil available. All prices include I.V.I.

Option A — Self‑service on the website (ideal for condominiums): verify coverage at data.cr/cobertura; choose plan; add IPTV (₡4,590/device) and/or VoIP (₡3,590); enter details; choose payment method; receive installation date by email.

Option B — Agent‑guided purchase (this channel): the agent helps verify coverage, select plan, add add‑ons, schedule installation, validate identity, collect exact address, send payment link, and confirm contract and installation date.
Step 1 — Verify coverage: visit data.cr/cobertura and share the result; blue means guaranteed coverage.
Step 2 — Select plan: 100/100, 250/250, 500/500, or 1/1 Gbps; agent maps usage (devices, streaming, calls, gaming, backups).
Step 3 — Add add‑ons: IPTV at ₡4,590 I.V.I. per device; VoIP at ₡3,590 I.V.I. per month; both can be combined.
Step 4 — Schedule installation: Tuesdays or Thursdays at 8:00 a.m. or 2:00 p.m.; subject to operational availability.
Step 5 — Identity validation: send photos of both sides of a valid, legible ID; good lighting, sharp focus, no glare.
Step 6 — Exact address: provide province, canton, district, neighborhood/condominium, street and house number or a verifiable landmark.
Step 7 — Payment link: agent issues ONVO link (Visa, Mastercard, American Express); SINPE IBAN and SINPE Móvil also available.
Step 8 — Confirmation and contract: after payment confirmation the contract is issued and a confirmation email is sent with the installation date.
Plan confirmation — valid values for “Plan” are 100, 250, 500, or 1000 (for 1 Gbps). Do not use “200.”
Confirmation example (no add‑ons): Plan: 100 | IPTV: 0 | Telephony: No
Confirmation example (with IPTV and telephony): Plan: 500 | IPTV: 1 | Telephony: Yes
Confirmation example (multiple IPTV, no telephony): Plan: 250 | IPTV: 2 | Telephony: No
Plan selection guide — Light use (1–2 people, HD streaming, occasional video calls): 100/100.
Plan selection guide — Family use (3–5 people, multiple video calls, streaming, schoolwork): 250/250.
Plan selection guide — Intensive use (4K, online gaming, cloud backups, several simultaneous users): 500/500.
Plan selection guide — Very demanding use (content creators, large downloads, hyper‑connected home): 1/1 Gbps.
Rule of thumb: if 3+ concurrent high‑demand activities (e.g., video call + 4K streaming + gaming), move up one speed tier for stability.
Script — Clarify coverage: Customer: “Is there service at my home?” Agent: “Go to data.cr/cobertura. If you see blue, coverage is guaranteed. Could you confirm the result?”
Script — Offer add‑ons: Agent: “You can add IPTV for ₡4,590 I.V.I. per device and Telephony for ₡3,590 I.V.I. per month. Would you like to include either?”
Script — Calculate total: Agent: “Great. Plan 100/100 (₡20,500) + 1 IPTV (₡4,590) + Telephony (₡3,590) = ₡28,680 I.V.I.”
Script — Schedule installation: Agent: “I have Tuesday or Thursday, 8:00 a.m. or 2:00 p.m. Which do you prefer?”
Script — Request ID and address: Agent: “Please send photos of both sides of your ID, sharp and glare‑free, and your exact address with house number.”
Script — Issue payment: Agent: “I’ll send your ONVO payment link. You can also use SINPE IBAN or SINPE Móvil. I’ll confirm once posted and we’ll generate the contract.”
FAQ — Can I add IPTV and Telephony at the same time? Yes. IPTV is charged per device (₡4,590 I.V.I. each) and VoIP adds ₡3,590 I.V.I. per month.
FAQ — How many IPTV devices can I add? Multiple devices; the fee is per device.
FAQ — Do the prices include taxes? Yes, all listed prices include I.V.I.
FAQ — Is the IPTV channel lineup fixed? It may vary due to programming agreements.
FAQ — What if my area isn’t blue on the map? An agent can take your details to check feasibility or contact you about future availability.

Privacy: ADN processes contact, payment, and service‑use data to deliver service, support, billing, authorized communications, and legal compliance. Browsing and IP addresses may be logged to provide and improve the service. Customers may request information or exercise rights via official channels.
Note: installation availability and dates depend on coverage validation and technical scheduling.
Note: IPTV lineup may change without prior notice.
Note: any price or condition updates are confirmed at the time of purchase.

Recommended chunk fields: company identity; residential plans (one per chunk); add‑ons (IPTV, Telephony); coverage and verification (include ‘blue’ rule); purchase process (Option A and Option B in separate chunks); payments and billing; support and contacts; FAQs and scripts.

Synonyms for recall: ADN ↔ American Data Networks; Residential Internet ↔ Residential fiber; VoIP telephony ↔ IP telephony; Firewall ↔ Perimeter firewall; IPTV ↔ Internet TV; 24/7 support ↔ continuous support.
